snippet: Colombia has for the first time declined to extradite to the United States a leftist rebel accused of drug trafficking as it pushes to conclude peace negotiations with the rebel group.
abstract: Colombia for first time declines to extradite Juan Vicente Carvajal, member of guerrilla group Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia, to United States amid peace talks.
lead_paragraph: Colombia has for the first time declined to extradite to the United States a leftist rebel accused of drug trafficking as it pushes to conclude peace negotiations with the rebel group.

headline.main: Colombia: Government Won’t Extradite Rebel to U.S.
headline.print_headline: Colombia: Government Won’t Extradite Rebel to U.S.
